ComicInfo.Summary: Areala has lately adopted a strangely over-aggressive nature that is interfering with her duties as Warrior Nun. Tensions begin to rise within St. Illumine Church as a friendly training exercise between Areala and Magic Priest Father Stone ends in a fierce battle. Puzzled by Areala's series of belligerent outbursts, the church decides to suspend her duties as Warrior Nun pending an investigation into her actions. Meanwhile, Ivan Seethe, aware of these recent events, sees an opportune moment to breach the Church's weakened defenses and create chaos throughout it!
